localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
blogPost.body: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
blogPost.title: Co-founder Question Cards - Questions to ask your co-founder to know each other better.
blogPost.author: Bryan Ho

localize.description: 下次你和你的联合创始人或潜在的合作伙伴在一起的时候，可以通过轮流回答这副联合创始人牌中的问题来更好地了解他们...... 更多地了解对方，这样你们才能更好地合作和单独工作。
localize.tagline: 问你的联合创始人一些问题，以便更好地了解对方。

localize.description: 下次你和你的聯合創始人或潛在的合作伙伴在一起的時候，可以通過輪流回答這副聯合創始人牌中的問題來更好地瞭解他們...... 更多地瞭解對方，這樣你們才能更好地合作和單獨工作。
localize.tagline: 問你的聯合創始人一些問題，以便更好地瞭解對方。

previous.excerpt: Here you'll find a collection of hand-curated tools that let you get more done with less time and effort 🚀 Each app has been designed with a specific task in mind, on top of being beautiful, intuitive, and fun to use 🤘
previous.title: Hidden Tools - Explore a collection of hand curated tools 🛠

localize.description: 在这里，你会发现一系列精心设计的工具，让你用更少的时间和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每个应用程序都是针对特定的任务而设计的，除了美观、直观和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工制作的工具 🛠。

localize.description: 在這裏，你會發現一系列精心設計的工具，讓你用更少的時間和精力完成更多的工作🚀，每個應用程序都是針對特定的任務而設計的，除了美觀、直觀和有趣的使用🤘。
localize.tagline: 探索一系列手工製作的工具 🛠。

next.excerpt: Pexels gives you unlimited access to over 3 million free, high-resolution photos and videos – now available at your fingertips anywhere you go with a newly re-designed app.
next.title: Pexels App 2.0 - 3M+ completely free photos and videos in one app

localize.description: Pexels 让您可以无限制地访问超过 300 万张免费的高分辨率照片和视频--现在您可以通过全新设计的应用程序随时随地获取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免费的照片和视频在一个应用程序中。

localize.description: Pexels 讓您可以無限制地訪問超過 300 萬張免費的高分辨率照片和視頻--現在您可以通過全新設計的應用程序隨時隨地獲取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免費的照片和視頻在一個應用程序中。
